channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Jon Jones Pleads Not Guilty To Charges Stemming From Drug Test Incident
item.description: UFC heavyweight champion Jon Jones isn't tapping out in his ongoing legal battle ... entering a not-guilty plea for the two misdemeanor charges he's f...

item.title: Bam Margera's Ex Was Never His Wife Despite Wedding, Court Tentatively Rules
item.description: Bam Margera and Nikki Boyd were never husband and wife in the eyes of the law, despite going through a wedding ceremony -- that's the word from the ju...

item.title: Thomas Matthew Crooks' Former Classmate Says He Was a Trump Hater
item.description: Thomas Matthew Crooks wasn't a fan of Donald Trump years before attempting to assassinate the former Prez ... so says one of his former classmates. Vi...

item.title: Eric Trump Says 'Competent' Shooter Would've Hit Dad, Pissed at Security Lapses
item.description: Eric Trump is furious with the security lapses leading up to the assassination attempt on his father ... and says a competent shooter wouldn't have mi...

item.title: Salt-N-Pepa's Sandra Denton Says Southwest Airlines Treated Her Like a Criminal
item.description: Sandra "Pepa" Denton, 1/2 of Salt-N-Pepa, is still shaken and confused by her encounter with Southwest Airlines this week, when she says she got treat...
